issue.title: [Release] Use the new changelog generation when updating the website
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9488](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9488). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The following command updates the CHANGELOG.md, but the same content should be added as release notes in the post-03-website.sh script.

See todo note https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7162/files#diff-58442bc78393d2113825def6aad913a0R143

```Java

archery release changelog add 1.0.0
```
